Message.Title: Coke - MCR screwed up again!
Message.Msg: Check out their My Coke Rewards facebook page. They ticked off a lot of their customers again. They seem like they have idiots writing their promos, as they promise their customers one thing but then the reality is they meant something vastly different.
I was just on the MCR website this morning and cashed in some more rewards points. Never went to their Facebook page. No need.
